select.sql: select p.Number,p.PlayerID,p.Age,p.Stamina,p.CountryID,p.Skl,c.Name_$lang; as Country,if(injury=0,null,'blue') as fontcolor,Lnk_Player(p.PlayerID,p.Name_$lang;,p.Injury,'$tournament;','$tour;') as Player, round(p.Skl) as Skl,6-round(Morale/4) as Smile,bonus(p.PlayerID,'$lang;') as Bonus, round(Skl*Stamina/100) as Power, concat(p.Position,IF(p.Combination='','','/'), Combination) as Pos , m.Name_$lang; as MoraleName, p.Morale from ut_players p left outer join ut_countries c on c.CountryID=p.CountryID left outer join ut_morale_types m on p.Morale<=m.MaxMorale and p.Morale>=m.MinMorale where p.TeamID='$auth->team;' and p.Injury>0 order by p.Position,p.Number
select.empty_eng: You don't have any injured players.
select.empty_ger: Sie haben keine Spieler mit den Verletzungen.

operate.select: select count(*) from ut_players where TeamID='$auth->team;' and Injury>(select 7-2*(max(Level)-1) from tm_staff where StaffID=7 and TeamID='$auth->team;')>0
operate.error_rus: Травмированных нет, или срок травмы больше срока реабилитации.
operate.error_eng: There are no injured players or injury term is more than reabilitation termю
operate.error_ger: Sie haben keine Spieler mit den Verletzungen oder Dauer der Verletzung ist laenger als Dauer der Rehabilitierung

field.name: Player
field.sql: select p.PlayerID,concat(p.Name_$lang;,' (',p.Injury,')') as Player from ut_players p where p.TeamID='$auth->team;' and p.Injury>0 and (p.Injury-(select 7-2*(max(Level)-1) from tm_staff where StaffID=7 and TeamID='$auth->team;'))>0 order by p.Position,p.Number

operate2.select: select p.PlayerID,p.Name_$lang; as Player,p.Injury,p.Injury-(select 7-2*(max(Level)-1) from tm_staff where StaffID=6 and TeamID='$auth->team;') as Term from ut_players p where p.PlayerID=@Player;
